weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, an unmistakably bright sun graces the sky, casting a warm glow that hints at the promise of a delightful day. The mild high of 62 degrees frames an afternoons’ gentle descent in temperature, inviting a pleasant solace as the city breathes under the invigorating northern winds. With gusts reaching into the upper thirties, one can sense a robust vitality in the air—not oppressive, but refreshingly crisp. As the afternoon unfurls, you might witness the city wear a cloak of clarity, with no fog in sight, affording splendid views from the hills to the waterfront.

Tonight, the sky will remain a canvas of deepening navy, adorned slowly by the rise of a cool breeze, ushering in a low of 47 degrees that beckons a touch of warmth. A light sweater or a light jacket will suffice as the day transitions into evening, the chill nudging at you softly. Consider a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, where the city’s lights begin their evening dance, or perhaps stop by a cozy café that calls for thoughtful conversation. Whether you find yourself wandering through the streets or seeking refuge in one of the many local haunts, today paints a picturesque scene to savor.
